data.description:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1771135456795-enwv4l.
Objective: Validate all p0 beads currently in stage:verification — confirm fixes landed correctly, especially retry items that failed on first attempt
Agent plan:
- 2 x frontend (UI verification and regression check)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-0j4: Investigate and fix bead action latency (~10s)
- foolery-3no: Rolling... with stop button table cell gets cut off
- foolery-brt: tab title blue dot in console should not keep flickering after process is complete
- foolery-c47: wave tree shows closed parents and omits wave id in title
- foolery-fo1: Prevent duplicate beat creation on repeated Done clicks
- foolery-i22: don't show wave tags
Notes: foolery-c47 (attempts:1) and foolery-i22 (attempts:1) both carry stage:retry — review prior fix diffs and failure context before verifying. If any verification fails, re-implement within this wave.
Assumptions:
- foolery-d6d and foolery-hw7 are already closed/landed, so their dependent p0 beads are unblocked
- Items in stage:verification have code already committed but need confirmation that fixes are correct
- Retry items may need re-implementation if prior fixes are insufficient
- All non-p0 beads are deferred to unassigned
